https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3BaFWAAgg74b8veZvm8uEv7pcjI.jpg Year 1763. Forced into exile, the famous libertine Giacomo Casanova leaves Paris and travels to London, where he meets Marianne de Charpillon, a young prostitute to whom he is so attracted that he forgets about the other women. Casanova, Last Love
